item.title: Platform Introduction
item.description:
KubeSphere adopts a fine-grained permission control mechanism. The KubeSphere web console varies based on the userâ€™s role.

This section, from the perspective of a user with the platform-admin role, introduces the modules and functionalities of the KubeSphere web console.

Module Functionality

KubeSphere Marketplace

The store for extensions, supporting subscription, installation, uninstallation, configuration, and updates of extensions.

App Store

item.title: Quick Access
item.description:
This section describes how to add or remove quick access to resources such as clusters, workspaces, and projects, allowing for quick navigation to their respective pages.

Prerequisites

You have the username and password to access the KubeSphere web console.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console.

  2. On the cluster list, workspace list, or project list page, click to add the corresponding resource to the Quick Access area on the Workbench. Click to remove the resource from the quick access.

    You can also click within the Quick Access area to remove the added resource.
